cookingTips: Pound sirloin thin between plastic wrap to even thickness for consistent cooking
Layer bacon and sautéed onions on beef, roll tightly, and secure with toothpicks
Cook bacon-wrapped rolls in butter over medium-high heat until bacon crisps and beef reaches desired doneness
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide through pounding meat properly, filling and rolling technique, and achieving crispy bacon while keeping beef juicy.
